tweet: #E15YearRound is great news for #IL18. Ethanol helps drive demand for corn in IL and I am grateful to @POTUS + @EPAAWheeler for following through on their promise. This will expand opportunity for our farmers, strengthen the ag economy, and provide greater choice at the pump.

This week, I joined @ILFBPres to call for action on USMCA. USMCA is a win for farmers across America, especially in Illinois. Delaying USMCA only prevents the ag community from seeing the critical benefits of this deal. Read our oped ⬇️ https://www.myjournalcourier.com/opinion/article/Commentary-Time-to-act-on-trade-pact-is-now-13900062.php …
